message.entry: categorical function could not convert the {0} values to valid category names.

Negative color data ignored.
Arguments must be a table followed by 2 table subscripts, a 2-dimensional numeric matrix, or 2 vectors followed by a 2-dimensional numeric matrix.
Not enough input arguments. Table argument must be followed by 2 table subscripts.
Specify the ''ColorVariable'' using a parameter name and value pair.
Parent container must be a figure, uipanel, or uitab.
Parent container is a deleted graphics object.
''ColorData'' must be a 2-dimensional numeric matrix.
''ColorData'' value must be a 4-row, uint8 matrix with the same number of columns as the length of the ''Strings'' value.
''VertexData'' value must be a 3-row, single matrix with the same number of columns as the length of the ''Strings'' value.
Method to calculate color data
